sentences.sContent: There were basically complete organelle structure in matural oocyte .
sentences.sContent_eng: There were basically complete organelle structure in matural oocyte .
sentences.sCn: 成熟卵子内已有基本完整的细胞器结构。

sentences.sContent: There is distinct nucleolus the naked nucleus and some dispersed organelle as lysosome around the nucleus.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is distinct nucleolus the naked nucleus and some dispersed organelle as lysosome around the nucleus.
sentences.sCn: 电镜下裸核有明显核仁，核周围有溶酶体等散落的细胞器。

sentences.sContent: Functional aspects of nuclear: : It is the largest organelle in the cell and the place for genetic storage, replication and transcription.
sentences.sContent_eng: Functional aspects of nuclear: : It is the largest organelle in the cell and the place for genetic storage, replication and transcription.
sentences.sCn: 细胞核的功能： 细胞核是真核细胞中最大的细胞器，也是遗传物质储存、复制和转录的场所。

words.tran: [有化] 有机的；组织的；器官的；根本的
有机地；有组织地；器官上地
有机体说；唯器官变化论

trans.tranOther: a structural and functional unit, such as a mitochondrion, in a cell or unicellular organism
